keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The Air Force says it has reprimanded a vice commander for effectively trying to restrict military personnel from communicating with members of Congress.
snippet: The Air Force says it has reprimanded a vice commander for effectively trying to restrict military personnel from communicating with members of Congress.
abstract: Air Force reprimands Maj Gen James Post after internal investigation supports contentions that Post effectively tried to restrict military personnel from communicating with Congressional members or staff.
